name: The Glitch Exists
description:
Controls : WASD to Move. Left Click or B to Shoot.

Survive as long as you can, and kill as much as you can.

Created in a couple of hours just for some fun and shit.

Music by Gichco can be found here : http://opengameart.org/content/lo-fi-chiptune-glitch-dnb

THANKS FOR PLAYING.
